text_ek: seeing more illuminati like symbols around households items so i was just sitting at home with no internet or cable to distract me from anything . as i was sitting and eating on my couch , i looked to my right and notice that my prescription medicine legit has an illuminati like symbol on it as the logo . i swear i m not trippin but now i am curious if anyone else has seen any illuminati like symbols around their house or anything ? if i was sitting on my phone , i would have never noticed this . funny how technology is a huge distraction maybe even a cover up

illuminati playing cards does anyone have these or know more about these playing cards ? they re called the illuminati playing cards , there s even expansion packs ! they were released in by occultist steve jackson . players control secret societies and compete against each other for world domination allcaps sjg allcaps steve jackson games there seems to have been predictions about pentagon attacks , , julian assange and trump . there are articles on it about predictive programming as well . upon looking at the rest of the deck , subliminal disclosure seems to come up a bit in relevance to current events , i thought that was super interesting . the cards are said to be inspired by this book sad the illuminatus trilogy ! in the s the book has themes such as numerology , counterculture , conspiracies , and cognitive dissonance , some of the books work even alludes to atlas shrugged . what do you all think about them ? which ones stood out the most to you ? here s a link of most of them scanned ! illuminati cards you can read more about the game here illuminati playing cards and here s an interesting article i stumbled on how apparently , the united states secret service allcaps us elongated allcaps raided the game company on and nearly destroyed jackson s games allcaps ussr allcaps steve jackson raid

could the baphomet , checkerboards , , and other satanic freemason symbolism found in music videos be put there simple to expand their audience conspiracy people ? there are tons of youtube videos a call for an uprising is the main channel that comes to mind that discuss illuminati and satanic symbolism in music videos . it is clear as day that this symbolism exists in these videos , but to conspiracy theorists , it s believed that the symbolism is put in there to mock us or to communicate with other people that are in the know . also , because they are all satanists . hashtag x 200 b hashtag my question is , could this symbolism just be put in these videos to get people talking about it ? to expand the audience the music reaches ? conspiracy theorists eat this shit up , and talk about it all the time in their videos , but is it as simple as them being played by intelligent marketers ? hashtag x 200 b hashtag i kind of want the conspiracy to be true because it s crazy and because it throws a curve ball in this little place called reality , i have watched a bunch of video about it , but now i am just wondering if everyone is being duped .

is the illuminati real and how do we stay safe from it ? i have been reading up a lot on conspiracy theories lately , especially about the allcaps nwo allcaps , the trading card game , and occult symbolism in the music film industry . as a christian i am very scared . i am terrified that my favorite musicians or movies are secretly brainwashing me , even religious music film . i am scared i am not safe for the end times because i have already been programmed and turned against god . i am worried for my family too . one of the scariest things for me personally is that i am attracted to the same gender . now all of a sudden after reading these theories , i am scared it was part of the illuminati s plan to normalize gay people all along and homosexuality is still a sin that will condemn those with those feelings or practice it to hell . i am also scared that the only reason i ended up this way was because of all the pop music i listened to and disney movies i watched as a kid that supposedly had subliminal messages . i feel like i can not trust any media . if it s true that everything is controlled , how can i live in this world without being influenced ? am i already too far gone ? is the number three times in a row never a coincidence ? does everything always mean something ? it feels like there is too much evidence . after all , the allcaps cia allcaps mind control programs turned out to be real . i am scared .

only thing that makes sense is demons ets are controlling some artiest actions i can not believe that everyone is involved , it defies reason to believe that every media source is controlled by the elites , but at the same time i can not deny the symbology some games , music , video and other media display . i think the most logical explanation is that entities outside our field of view are messing with our actions . when we create art sometimes we accidentally create illuminati symbology because these entries are manipulating our actions .

what would your job be when joining the evil ? thought of this in another thread and thought it might be nice to have little light hearted thread on here . they say everybody has a price . the illuminati , the order , satanists , reptillians whatever come up to you and offer you that price to shut up , stop exposing them and join them , they also cure whatever sick relative you have , they make your dog live as long as you etc . you accept this offer but only if they make you head of the department of your choosing . what department would you choose ? i would choose to be head of the hidden symbolism department . hiding masonic symbols in dollars , putting satanic symbols in music video s . deciding what hand symbols the president will use in his next speech . if you take the evil out of it , the job seems really fun .

the new series of unfortunate events is full of blatant symbolism on the illuminati and the bible . what the f did i just watch ? spoilers do not read if you haven t seen it and want to watch . so i just finished watching the whole series which came out about a week ago and i am really creeped out . in the final episode they have such blatant references that i cannot help but wonder if they are trying to make it obvious what kind of philosophy they adhere to . first i had noticed the allcaps vfd allcaps symbol a while ago looking like the famous hand eye thing a lot of famous people do . i chalked it up to just silly symbolism . the seeing eye is a pretty common symbol so i didn t think much of it . but the last two episodes were insane . so first they go and land on an island that is the symbol of the eye . that s fine . then they go and meet a man named ishmael which is a clear biblical reference . then there is a part that they are dying from some fungus and they are given an apple by a snake . they all eat from the apple , the girl s first , of course , starting with the baby . this part creeped me out the most . why add a snake ? why use an apple ? it was so blatant . like the devil will save you ? what ? ok let me just point out i am allcaps not allcaps religious , i m agnostic . yet , when you use blatant world wide , known symbolism , you have to wonder what the references are trying to say . i mean maybe i m looking way too far into this but i can t find anyone talking about this , so i decided to see if anyone else had any theories on what it all means . i found an archived post from a year ago referencing the name of the author daniel handler , as in a handler , or someone who sells children into sex slavery . is this another reference ? i honestly thought it was a cute gothic styled kid s show but after watching it all i am so freaking creeped out . not sure what to think of it all now . so what do you all think ? is this looking too far into it or do you think this may be some subliminal messages given to children ?

big lebowski is there anyone else who s noticed in the beginning of the movie while the dude is buying milk with a check the date on the check is . meanwhile in the dialogue of the narrator is talking about middle eastern conflict ? i know it may not be a thing but maybe ? some illuminati shit or whatever ? anyone ?

while there is a decent amount of videos about the analysis of symbolism in pop music culture , talking about it in normal settings will make you seem like a nutjob as a fan of pop culture and music , i watched several videos about symbolism used in pop culture , how repetitive it is and how it is tied to specific meanings for example the symbol of the eye . honestly i noticed that every video brings up satanism , hidden cults or mk ultra etc i understand that sometimes symbols are used in an artistic context and meaning and not everything has to be tied to cults or whatever . repeated but as someone who has been listening to mainstream music for a decade i find it strange that artists tend to do the same symbols over and over . anyway these type of conspiracy theories have lost credibility , memes were made if my memory does not lie i remember the illuminati meme or the reptilian meme to kinda mock it etc i feel like the more extreme they get and the more they bring up religion , the more they lose their credibility or something . here in my countries there were youtube channel made about this topic and even tv programs but obviously they look like some sort of crazy shit made up to entertain bored people . personally i do not fully believe it but there is some truth behind it considering all the shit that popped up lately . what do you think ? my intent is having a discussion about it , nothing more or nothing else i hope you understand what i mean , english is not my first language
